name: lakeloui-se-orchestrator
description: Mono-Lambda orchestrator for lakeloui.se â€” EventBridge every 15 min

scripts.build: tsc && for f in dist/*.js; do cp "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done && node scripts/patch-cjs-requires.mjs && npm prune --omit=dev && cp -r node_modules dist/
scripts.dry-render: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development node run_dry_render.cjs
scripts.dry-render:4am: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development REPORT_TYPE=4am node run_dry_render.cjs
scripts.dry-render:6am: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development REPORT_TYPE=6am node run_dry_render.cjs
scripts.dry-render:open: npm run dry-render && (xdg-open /tmp/lakeloui_live_dry_index.html 2>/dev/null || open /tmp/lakeloui_live_dry_index.html 2>/dev/null || echo 'Open file:///tmp/lakeloui_live_dry_index.html in your browser')
